abstract.t: This document describes the Thin variant of the Datagram Congestion Control Protocol (DCCP) Congestion Control Identifier 3, TCP- Friendly Rate Control (TFRC). The Thin variant is more restricted than CCID 3; it limits allowable options, acceptable feature values, and so forth. CCID 3-Thin packets are still valid DCCP CCID 3 packets. CCID 3-Thin was designed for small clients where a full DCCP implementation would be too expensive.
